channel.title: [OSRS 95] OS-Scape
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/eSZqL6P.png[/img]
Newest media will be moved to the top. [SPOILER=Server Media] [img]http://vgy.me/IHuqkN.gif[/img] [img]http://vgy.me/UMG7qC.gif[/img] [IMG]http://vgy.me/An65q5.gif[/img] [IMG]http://vgy.me/1go2G5.gif[/img] [IMG]http://vgy.me/kv0Jmy.gif[/img] [IMG]http://vgy.me/611Din.gif[/img] [IMG]https://media.giphy.com/media/3o85xouhYYPgad2Zxe/giphy.gif[/img] [img]http://vgy.me/6YDUfn.gif[/img] [img]http://vgy.me/l5qBfR.gif[/img] [img]http://vgy.me/aXjpDB.gif[/img] [img]http://vgy.me/pNJfrI.gif[/img] [img]http://vgy.me/CKajkr.gif[/img] [img]http://vgy.me/w8mNK6.png[/img] [img]http://vgy.me/8xbxln.png[/img] [img]http://vgy.me/YjkQJH.png[/img] [img]http://vgy.me/aXjpDB.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/BxlHI3g.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qDAFNuu.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sjhesHH.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6fP6zfc.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QyOh8s9.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Y1rlVNv.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/GJFjCYC.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hkYnGXB.gif[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gO1A6ow.gif[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Big .GIF files] [IMG]https://media.giphy.com/media/3oEduKTEP5TbbPQSYM/giphy.gif[/img]
[IMG]https://media.giphy.com/media/3o85xET60VoOSxzroc/giphy.gif[/img]
[img]http://vgy.me/IHuqkN.gif[/img]
[img]http://vgy.me/UMG7qC.gif[/img] [/SPOILER]
[table][tr] [td][/td] [td][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/46wacVG.png[/img]
OS-Scape is an OSRS based project we started in August that will be aimed towards setting a new expectation of server quality. We plan on creating a server that we think meets the current needs and expectations of the RSPS community. There has been a very small choice in quality servers for you guys to play, and that changes now. We plan on being an economy based server, with a focus on PVP. We will be in heavy development for the next while so please feel free to not only assist us with the direction of the server by suggesting server content, but also participate in community polls for important features we plan on releasing. I hope to hear from you guys sometime soon!
[Img]http://i.imgur.com/Z2eEBCl.png[/img]
The currently server isn't at a playable state right now. By that, I mean we don't have enough content completed to keep you guys entertained as long as we'd need to to complete the server. Bart has done a lot in regards to server development over the past month, and he's put a tremendous amount of effort and detail into everything he's done to ensure a level of quality unseen in the current RSPS community. I'm sure we'll be opening a beta server in a couple of weeks to a month for you guys to help us increase the quality of the server by making us aware of bugs we might've over looked, and also to suggest content you'd like to see in the server before release. I hope to see you participate in the future polls, and even the beta when the time comes! If you have any other questions, please do let me know and I'll answer them to the best of my ability.
[/td]
[td][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cdqSTHt.png[/img]
[/td][/tr][/table][CODE] Bart, Sat Oct 31 18:25:37 2015 +0100: Add most player block animations Bart, Sat Oct 31 16:55:36 2015 +0100: Improve combat Bart, Sat Oct 31 16:54:36 2015 +0100: Add combat info to abyssal demon Bart, Sat Oct 31 16:54:28 2015 +0100: Add abyssal demon drops Bart, Sat Oct 31 15:07:15 2015 +0100: COSS-99 Populate slayer tower Bart, Sat Oct 31 13:05:05 2015 +0100: COSS-74 Add EvP base Bart, Sat Oct 31 10:21:42 2015 +0100: Tweak gem cutting Situations, Sat Oct 31 00:41:14 2015 -0600: Added player extension for gem item options Situations, Sat Oct 31 00:40:53 2015 -0600: Added crafting armor enum Situations, Sat Oct 31 00:40:04 2015 -0600: Added support for gem crafting Bart, Fri Oct 30 23:40:30 2015 +0100: COSS-90 Add potion brewing Bart, Fri Oct 30 07:36:13 2015 +0100: COSS-93 Fix grammatical error in herb cleaning Bart, Fri Oct 30 00:11:26 2015 +0100: Fix equipment info for varrock plate Bart, Thu Oct 29 23:06:42 2015 +0100: COSS-91 Add sounds to thieving Bart, Thu Oct 29 22:59:44 2015 +0100: COSS-88 Add sql 'premium_days' and 'premium_tokens' fields for monetization later on Situations, Thu Oct 29 15:47:42 2015 -0600: Herb cleaning Situations, Thu Oct 29 02:04:20 2015 -0600: Thieving stall in Ardougne without rewards. [table][tr]
[td][/td]
[td]

OS-Scape is an OSRS based project we started in August that will be aimed towards setting a new
expectation of server quality. We plan on creating a server that we think meets the current needs
and expectations of the RSPS community. There has been a very small choice in quality servers for
you guys to play, and that changes now. We plan on being an economy based server, with a focus
on PVP. We will be in heavy development for the next while so please feel free to not only assist us
with the direction of the server by suggesting server content, but also participate in community
polls for important features we plan on releasing. I hope to hear from you guys sometime soon!

The currently server isn’t at a playable state right now. By that, I mean we don’t have enough content
completed to keep you guys entertained as long as we’d need to to complete the server. Bart has done
a lot in regards to server development over the past month, and he’s put a tremendous amount of effort
and detail into everything he’s done to ensure a level of quality unseen in the current RSPS community.
I’m sure we’ll be opening a beta server in a couple of weeks to a month for you guys to help us increase
the quality of the server by making us aware of bugs we might’ve over looked, and also to suggest content
you’d like to see in the server before release. I hope to see you participate in the future polls, and even the
beta when the time comes! If you have any other questions, please do let me know and I’ll answer them to
the best of my ability.

[/td]

[td]

[/td][/tr][/table][CODE]
